item.title: Formatters
item.description: Formatters # The easiest way to get a formatted element is to use the formatted method that is available on a myriad of data types without the need to instantiate our own formatter. And the best thing is that all these things are also available directly on SwiftUI controls like Text and TextField by using the format parameter.
